meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vidya Srinivasan Sean Harrington Neil Uspal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7451.

td.p: Vidya Srinivasan, a student from Chevy Chase, Maryland
Sean Harrington, an engineer from Houston, Texas
Neil Uspal, a pediatric emergency medicine physician from Seattle, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,400)

tr.td: FROM CHUMPS TO CHAMPS
HEALTH & MEDICINE
QUIZINE
SHOOTING BLANKS
GREEK LETTERS & ROMAN NUMERALS
AMERICAN WOMEN

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Boston Celtics

Neil
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: They went from 29-53 in 1979 to 62-20 & an NBA title in 1981; adding Bird, Parish & McHale will do that

tr.td: Neil
Sean
Vidya
PYRAMIDS
BOOKS BY PROFESSORS
NATIONAL PARKS OF THE WORLD
RELIGIOUS MATTERS
DOUBLE O, 7
(Alex: Each correct response will be a 7-letter word, and it will have a double "O" in it.)
OTHER BOND FILM CHARACTERS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
